pageContent: Background: Ghrelin (GHRL) is a polypeptide that can specifically bind to the growth hormone secretagogue receptor (GHSR). The expression of GHSR is significantly different in normal and prostate cancer (PC) tissues in humans. It is important to find an effective diagnostic method for the diagnosis and prognosis of invasive PC/neuroendocrine prostate cancer (NEPC).

metaData.source:
Psychological effects of androgen-deprivation therapy on men with prostate cancer and their partners
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26372364/
